item.title: My Vote Was Easy
item.description: Despite a massive line of people waiting for the polls to open this morning, when I went to vote just now I discovered… no line whatsoever. What a letdown! I wanted to do some sacrificing like hard struggling adherents to the cause of freedom the world over have done, just to get to the polling place, let alone cast their vote. But no, everything had to go quickly and smoothly.
